scripts.do-changelog: npm run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog' --no-verify
scripts.post-v: npm run do-changelog && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-v && npm version major -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-v && npm version minor -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-v && npm version patch -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-prerelease: npm run pre-v && npm version prerelease -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.build: rm -rf lib/ && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:rename
scripts.build:rename: mv lib/esm/mobx-requestor.js lib/mobx-requestor.mjs && mv lib/esm/mobx-requestor.d.ts lib/mobx-requestor.d.mts && rm -rf lib/esm
